I have lost or never recieved my login information.

I have lost or never recieved credentials. How do I request a replacement?

Username/Password combinations are distributed as needed. Usually, This occurs as your app enters production. However, There are certain occasions where you may not need this.

If you have not recived your credentials or have misplaced them, let us know and we will regenerate a new username/password combination for you.
